short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns the textinput into a textarea field

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hey Webflow users!

You know that super annoying thing where you cant see your full attributes because the input field is tiny? Yeah, that drove me crazy too. So I made this small extension that fixes it.

What it does:
It just makes the attribute value field bigger - like a proper textarea instead of that narrow input box. Now you can finally see your whole attribute without that weird horizontal scrolling :)
Its really basic but saves so much time when your working with custom attributes in Webflow. Especially helpful for stuff like conditions or longer code snippets.
I originally made this for myself but thought other Webflow users might find it useful too.
Give it a try if your also tired of that small input field
